## Interactive Visualization

```{ojs}
import { select } from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@observablehq/inputs@0.12/+esm";
import { Plot } from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@observablehq/plot/+esm";

// Define the iris dataset
const iris = [
  { "Sepal Length": 5.1, "Sepal Width": 3.5, "Petal Length": 1.4, "Petal Width": 0.2, "Species": "setosa" },
  { "Sepal Length": 4.9, "Sepal Width": 3.0, "Petal Length": 1.4, "Petal Width": 0.2, "Species": "setosa" },
  // Add more data points here...
];

viewof x = select(["Sepal Length", "Sepal Width", "Petal Length", "Petal Width"], { label: "X Variable" });
viewof y = select(["Sepal Length", "Sepal Width", "Petal Length", "Petal Width"], { label: "Y Variable" });

Plot.plot({
  marks: [
    Plot.dot(iris, { x: d => d[x], y: d => d[y], fill: "Species" })
  ]
})
```
